title: "Untitled"
format: html
---


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
dplyr::glimpse(diamonds)

# diamonds |> 
#     ggplot(aes(price, carat, color = cut)) +
#     geom_point()

ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = price, y = carat, color = cut)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(
    title = "Diamonds: Price vs Carat",
    subtitle = Sys.time(),
    x = "Price (USD)",
    y = "Carat",
    color = "Cut"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

```
